com.codered.ecomerce.CheckoutController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CheckoutController extends App implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
CheckoutController controls the operation of the checkout page

    • search

      public void search(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      method to perform search from the search bar when the search button is clicked. This method retrieves the text from the searchTextBox and prints it to the console. Brings you to searchResults Page
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the fxml file
